SamPy.resolve.misc.findSlitsDirectImage.FindSlitPositionsInDirectImage¶

class SamPy.resolve.misc.findSlitsDirectImage.FindSlitPositionsInDirectImage(configfile, debug, section='DEFAULT')¶

This class can be used to find slit positions in a direct image. It fits the slits separately to recover their sky positions.

__init__(configfile, debug, section='DEFAULT')¶

Constructor

Methods

__init__(configfile, debug[, section]) Constructor
approxSkyPosition() Generates an approximated sky position for slits.
fitSlitsToDirectImage([normalize]) Fits slits to a direct image to recover their position an orientation.
fitSlitsToDirectImage2() Fits slits to a direct image to recover their position an orientation.
generateSlitImages([output, type]) Generates diagnostic plots from slit image.
outputMinima() Outputs the results to a file and also the screen if debug = True.
outputShiftedImage() Outputs a FITS file in which the slits have been shifted
overPlotSlits([output, type, logscale]) Overplot the slits to image data.
pickleVars() This simple method pickles all important variables
plotMinimalization([output, type]) Generates a two dimensional map of the minimalization for each slit separately.
run() Driver function, runs all required steps.
writeDS9RegionFile([output]) Writes a DS9 region file for all the slits.
